name: James N. Almeida
bio: An author is the creator or originator of any written work similar as a book or play, and is also considered a pen or minstrel. More astronomically defined, an author is"the person who began or gave actuality to anything"and whose authorship determines responsibility for what was created.
quote: All writers are vain, selfish and lazy, and at the very bottom of their motives lies a mystery. Writing a book is a long, exhausting struggle, like a long bout of some painful illness. One would never undertake such a thing if one were not driven by some demon whom one can neither resist nor understand
